definition: long robe (old)
surname Yuan
Yuan Shikai (1859-1916), senior general of late Qing, subsequently warlord and self-proclaimed emperor of China
Anita Yuen (1971-), Hong Kong actress
Yuan Shao (153-202), general during late Han, subsequently warlord
Yuan Mei (1716-1798), famous Qing poet and critic, one of Three great poets of the Qianlong era 乾嘉三大家
Yuanzhou district of Yichun city 宜春市, Jiangxi
Yuan Jing (1911-), writer, dramatist and film critic
Yuanzhou district of Yichun city 宜春市, Jiangxi
Yuan Hongdao (1568-1610), Ming dynasty poet and travel writer
silver coin from the early days of the Republic of China (1912-1949) bearing the head of Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4 kai3]
Yuan Yuling (-1674) Qing writer, author of 西樓記|西楼记[Xi1 lou2 Ji4]
opposing Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯 in War of national protection 1915-1916/same as 反袁鬥爭|反袁斗争
opposing Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯 in War of national protection 護國爭|护国争 1915-1916/same as 反袁鬥爭|反袁斗争
war of 1915 against Yuan Shikai and for the Republic
Yuan Jue (1267-1327), Yuan dynasty writer and calligrapher

sentences.english: Dr Yuan, many people rid hunger.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧有袁博士，使很多人擺脫了飢餓。

sentences.english: Dr. Yuan searched for a way to increase rice harvests without expanding the area of fields.
sentences.chinese: 袁博士在不擴大種地面積的基礎上尋求增收的途徑。

sentences.english: Dr Yuan Longping grows what is called super hybrid rice.
sentences.chinese: 袁博士種植的是被稱爲“超級雜交水稻”的稻種。

sentences.english: Dr Yuan graduated from Southwest Agriculture College.
sentences.chinese: 袁博士結業於西南農業大學。

sentences.english: How long does it take to get to the hotel?
sentences.chinese: 袁，我今天來機場接妳，並且帶妳去妳的飯店。

sentences.english: Comrade Yuan presided over all the workshops.
sentences.chinese: 袁同志負責管理所有的車間。

sentences.english: The authorities subsequently barred Yuan from leaving China and forced her to return to her native Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 當局隨後禁止袁離開中國，並強迫她回到其家鄉山東。

sentences.english: Sentiments and inspiration are embodiment of Spirituality.
sentences.chinese: 性情與靈趣是性靈在袁文中的展現。

sentences.english: Dr Yuan grows what is called super hybrid rice.
sentences.chinese: 袁博士種植了被人稱作超級雜交水稻的稻穀。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter "the Yuan Can Article States Discusses": Analyzes Yuan Can's write Style and doctrine attainments in Buddhist.
sentences.chinese: 分析袁粲嬉笑怒罵的文風及其在佛法中的造詣。

sentences.english: That is why suddenly Yuan Tengfei quickly became popular reasons.
sentences.chinese: 這就是袁騰飛爲什麼會突然迅速竄紅的原因。

sentences.english: Yuan and Lüproposed a password auth en tication scheme with smartcards .
sentences.chinese: 袁，呂提出了一種智能卡口令認證方案。

sentences.english: Feng mansion opposite the Yuan mansion.
sentences.chinese: 袁公館對面馮國璋的大宅。

sentences.english: Lee, are you ok recently? I am Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 李，你最近還好嗎？我是袁。

sentences.english: Yuan knew immediately that a few years later, the little boy would die.
sentences.chinese: 袁馬上就算出來幾年後，那個小男孩就會死掉。

sentences.english: By 1276, most of the Southern Song territory had been captured by Yuan forces.
sentences.chinese: 由1276年，大多數的南宋領土已被抓獲袁部隊。
